comment.body: The hookup is exactly the same to regular video websites. But instead of pointing the video source to a file on your site you point it to the IPFS link. Detecting IPFS is pretty simple too just requiring an ajax request to the IPFS webui.

IPFS also has a good API so you can easily make an one button press to do certain functions (such as file pinning and peer lookup). On a site, that isn't sandboxed, it would be easy to do communication with IPFS without user interaction. I think the best part about IPFS is how exponential the file is.
